data.enText: to become wider; to make sth wider

data.chText: 溪水在这里变宽，成了一条河。
data.enText: Here the stream widens into a river.

data.chText: 他们可能得拓宽这条道路以适应车辆的增多。
data.enText: They may have to widen the road to cope with the increase in traffic.
to become larger in degree or range; to make sth larger in degree or range

data.chText: 贫富之间日益扩大的差距
data.enText: the widening gap between rich and poor

data.chText: 我们计划通过开设更多的语言课程扩大我们现有的活动范围。
data.enText: We plan to widen the scope of our existing activities by offering more language courses.

data.chText: 这项法规的范围将扩大到包括所有的枪支。
data.enText: The legislation will be widened to include all firearms.

word_means: 扩展，程度加深，范围扩大

tr: become broader or wider or more extensive

example: Let out that dress--I gained a lot of weight

tr: extend in scope or range or area
example: The law was extended to all citizens

value.def: If you widen something or if it widens, it becomes greater in measurement from one side or edge to the other.

example.ex: He had an operation last year to widen a heart artery...
example.tran: 去年他接受了一个扩张心脏动脉的手术。

example.ex: The river widens considerably as it begins to turn east.
example.tran: 河流转向东流时河道大幅度变宽。

example.ex: They have ordered the widening of the road where the incident took place.
example.tran: 他们已下令拓宽出事路段。

value.def: If you widen something or if it widens, it becomes greater in range or it affects a larger number of people or things.

example.ex: U.S. prosecutors have widened a securities-fraud investigation...
example.tran: 美国检察官扩大了对一起证券欺诈案的调查范围。

example.ex: The search for my brother widened...
example.tran: 对我弟弟的搜索范围扩大了。

example.ex: Newspapers enjoyed a widening circle of readers.
example.tran: 报纸拥有越来越广泛的读者群。

value.def: If your eyes widen, they open more.

example.ex: His eyes widened as he spoke the words.
example.tran: 他说这番话时眼睛瞪大了。

value.def: If a difference or gap widens or if something widens it, it becomes greater.

example.ex: Wage differences in the two areas are widening...
example.tran: 两个地区的工资差距正在拉大。

example.ex: The US trade deficit widened to $7.59 billion in November.
example.tran: 11月美国的贸易赤字扩大到75.9亿美元。

example.ex: ...policies that widen the gap between the rich and the poor.
